action: Click the dropdown menu labeled "Turn off hard disks" and select "Never".
expected_results: The "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu will display "Never".

action: Click the "Never" option in the "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu will display "Never".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open, and the desired power scheme is selected.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close, and the changes to the power scheme settings will be applied.

action: Click the dropdown arrow next to the "Screen saver" field.
expected_results: A list of available screensaver options will appear.
